definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: mng. dub.; only ´[[קִבְּחוּ פ]] Na 2:11, Joe 2:6; Thes, all faces gather a glow (glow with dread, fr. assumed √ [[פאר]]), so We Now; AE Hi al. gather in (their) beauty (√ I. [[פאר]]; grow pale); Vrss AV gather blackness (fr. [[פָּרוּר]] a pot !), v. Dr; all very uncertain.
